definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
Empress Dowager Cixi or Ts'u Hsi (1835-1908), regent 1861-1908
Empress Dowager Cixi or Ts'u Hsi (reigned 1861-1908)
Grand Prince Yixin (1833-1898), sixth son of Emperor Daoguang, prominent politician, diplomat and modernizer in late Qing

An Dehai (-1869), the Qing equivalent of Rasputin, all-powerful court eunuch with the dowager empress Cixi 慈禧太后[Ci2 xi3 tai4 hou4], executed in 1869 by her rival Empress Mother Empress Dowager Ci'an 慈安皇太后
Fulin Emperor Shunzhi (1638-1662), second Qing emperor, reigned 1644-1662

given name of Qing Emperor Xianfeng 咸豐|咸丰
Zai Yi (1856-1922), Manchu imperial prince and politician, disgraced after supporting the Boxers
lit. to govern from behind the curtain/to rule in place of the emperor (idiom)
coup by Dowager Empress Cixi 慈禧太后[Ci2 xi3 tai4 hou4] ending the 1898 attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
